title: Kundalini Yoga
description: An ancient practice that emphasizes breath control, meditation, and repetitive movements to awaken the dormant spiritual energy and achieve higher consciousness.

title: Vinyasa Yoga
description: A dynamic and fluid style of yoga that links breath with movement, transitioning through various poses in a continuous flow to build strength, stamina, and mindfulness.

title: Bikram Yoga
description: A style of yoga practiced in a heated room, consisting of a fixed sequence of 26 postures and two breathing exercises, designed to promote detoxification, flexibility, and mental focus.

title: Yin Yoga
description: A slow-paced and meditative style of yoga that involves holding passive postures for an extended duration to target deep connective tissues, promoting relaxation and flexibility.
